categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Kanda was a male Human Jedi Master stationed on Ilum in 3640 BBY, when he was killed.

Kanda appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Ilum. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
